description: Returns information about a specific domain.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the domain.

nested_items.name: DefaultExpirationDays
nested_items.description: The default number of days until the data within the domain expires.

nested_items.name: DefaultEncryptionKey
nested_items.description: The default encryption key, which is an AWS managed key, is used when no specific type of encryption key is specified. It is used to encrypt all data before it is placed in permanent or semi-permanent storage.

nested_items.name: DeadLetterQueueUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the SQS dead letter queue, which is used for reporting errors associated with ingesting data from third party applications.

nested_items.name: ProfileCount
nested_items.description: The total number of profiles currently in the domain.

nested_items.name: MeteringProfileCount
nested_items.description: The number of profiles that you are currently paying for in the domain. If you have more than 100 objects associated with a single profile, that profile counts as two profiles. If you have more than 200 objects, that profile counts as three, and so on.

nested_items.name: ObjectCount
nested_items.description: The total number of objects in domain.

nested_items.name: TotalSize
nested_items.description: The total size, in bytes, of all objects in the domain.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: The flag that enables the matching process of duplicate profiles.

nested_items.name: JobSchedule
nested_items.description: The day and time when do you want to start the Identity Resolution Job every week.

nested_items.name: DayOfTheWeek
nested_items.description: The day when the Identity Resolution Job should run every week.

nested_items.name: Time
nested_items.description: The time when the Identity Resolution Job should run every week.

nested_items.name: AutoMerging
nested_items.description: Configuration information about the auto-merging process.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: The flag that enables the auto-merging of duplicate profiles.

nested_items.name: Consolidation
nested_items.description: A list of matching attributes that represent matching criteria. If two profiles meet at least one of the requirements in the matching attributes list, they will be merged.

nested_items.name: MatchingAttributesList
nested_items.description: A list of matching criteria.
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConflictResolution
nested_items.description: How the auto-merging process should resolve conflicts between different profiles. For example, if Profile A and Profile B have the same FirstName and LastName (and that is the matching criteria), which EmailAddress should be used?

nested_items.name: ConflictResolvingModel
nested_items.description: How the auto-merging process should resolve conflicts between different profiles.
RECENCY: Uses the data that was most recently updated.

SOURCE: Uses the data from a specific source. For example, if a company has been aquired or two departments have merged, data from the specified source is used. If two duplicate profiles are from the same source, then RECENCY is used again.

nested_items.name: SourceName
nested_items.description: The ObjectType name that is used to resolve profile merging conflicts when choosing SOURCE as the ConflictResolvingModel.

nested_items.name: MinAllowedConfidenceScoreForMerging
nested_items.description: A number between 0 and 1 that represents the minimum confidence score required for profiles within a matching group to be merged during the auto-merge process. A higher score means higher similarity required to merge profiles.

nested_items.name: ExportingConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration information for exporting Identity Resolution results, for example, to an S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: S3Exporting
nested_items.description: The S3 location where Identity Resolution Jobs write result files.

nested_items.name: S3BucketName
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket where Identity Resolution Jobs write result files.

nested_items.name: S3KeyName
nested_items.description: The S3 key name of the location where Identity Resolution Jobs write result files.

nested_items.name: RuleBasedMatching
nested_items.description: The process of matching duplicate profiles using the Rule-Based matching. If RuleBasedMatching = true, Amazon Connect Customer Profiles will start to match and merge your profiles according to your configuration in the RuleBasedMatchingRequest. You can use the ListRuleBasedMatches and GetSimilarProfiles API to return and review the results. Also, if you have configured ExportingConfig in the RuleBasedMatchingRequest, you can download the results from S3.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: The flag that enables the rule-based matching process of duplicate profiles.

nested_items.name: MatchingRules
nested_items.description: Configures how the rule-based matching process should match profiles. You can have up to 15 MatchingRule in the MatchingRules.
AccountNumber.
Address.Address.
Address.City.
Address.Country.
Address.County.
Address.PostalCode.
Address.State.
Address.Province.
BirthDate.
BusinessName.
EmailAddress.
FirstName.
Gender.
LastName.
MiddleName.
PhoneNumber.
Any customized profile attributes that start with the Attributes.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: PENDING.

The first status after configuration a rule-based matching rule. If it is an existing domain, the rule-based Identity Resolution waits one hour before creating the matching rule. If it is a new domain, the system will skip the PENDING stage.

nested_items.name: MaxAllowedRuleLevelForMerging
nested_items.description: MatchingRule.

nested_items.name: MaxAllowedRuleLevelForMatching
nested_items.description: Indicates the maximum allowed rule level.

nested_items.name: AttributeTypesSelector
nested_items.description: Configures information about the AttributeTypesSelector where the rule-based identity resolution uses to match profiles.

nested_items.name: AttributeMatchingModel
nested_items.description: Configures the AttributeMatchingModel, you can either choose ONE_TO_ONE or MANY_TO_MANY.

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: The Address type. You can choose from Address, BusinessAddress, MaillingAddress, and ShippingAddress.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: PhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The PhoneNumber type. You can choose from PhoneNumber, HomePhoneNumber, and MobilePhoneNumber.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EmailAddress
nested_items.description: The Email type. You can choose from EmailAddress, BusinessEmailAddress and PersonalEmailAddress.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConflictResolution
nested_items.description: How the auto-merging process should resolve conflicts between different profiles.

nested_items.name: ConflictResolvingModel
nested_items.description: How the auto-merging process should resolve conflicts between different profiles.
RECENCY: Uses the data that was most recently updated.

SOURCE: Uses the data from a specific source. For example, if a company has been aquired or two departments have merged, data from the specified source is used. If two duplicate profiles are from the same source, then RECENCY is used again.

nested_items.name: SourceName
nested_items.description: The ObjectType name that is used to resolve profile merging conflicts when choosing SOURCE as the ConflictResolvingModel.

nested_items.name: ExportingConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration information about the S3 bucket where Identity Resolution Jobs writes result files.

nested_items.name: S3Exporting
nested_items.description: The S3 location where Identity Resolution Jobs write result files.

nested_items.name: S3BucketName
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket where Identity Resolution Jobs write result files.

nested_items.name: S3KeyName
nested_items.description: The S3 key name of the location where Identity Resolution Jobs write result files.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the domain was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the domain was most recently edited.
(string) ---
(string) ---
